'''Ungwith the Craghearted''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A particularly hard-headed captain, Ungwith is known for having no patience for fools and even less for drunken fools.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved = [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/): Ungwith guards the way to the forge.
